Following external cephalic version ( ECV ) , fetus may spontaneously return breech position . The success rate vary 30 % nulliparous woman , 67 % multiparous woman [ 6 ] . DOC.criteria: ASA III 37 + week gestation No previous attempt ECV pregnancy No fetal abnormality No previous uterine surgery Any contraindication vaginal delivery Contraindications regional analgesia : uncorrected hypovolemia , coagulopathy ( include anticoagulant lowdose [ 100mg ] aspirin ) , infection inflammation skin overlie lumbar area , raise intracranial pressure , hypersensitivity amide local anesthetic agent .
